Title: Designates a portion of the state highway system the "Senior Investigator Thomas M. O'Neil Memorial Bridge"
Summary: Designates the bridge over the Sagtikos Parkway on Crooked Hill Road between Community College Drive and Pilgrim Center Road in the town of Islip, county of Suffolk, the "Senior Investigator Thomas M. O'Neil Memorial Bridge".
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to designating a portion of the state highway system as the "Senior Investigator Thomas M. O'Neil Memorial Bridge"
